attributes.additional_details:
There is plenty of other land in the park which could be used instead of taking our allotments away.

 Please sign this petition and ask Birmingham City Council to reverse any decision to use the allotment land in any way for the Commonwealth Games.
attributes.background: Walsall Road Allotments are a thriving, multi-cultural community of 100 gardeners in north Birmingham. We are under threat of closure because the 2022 Commonwealth Games are taking place at the Alexander stadium which is  in the same park where our allotments are situated.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition Birmingham City Council here:

https://www.birmingham.gov.uk/info/20146/consultation_and_engagement/702/petitions
